title: Perfect German chocolate cake
ingredients: ['115g dark baking chocolate', '125ml water', '250g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '225g butter, softened', '400g caster sugar', '4 egg yolks', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '250ml buttermilk', '4 egg whites', '340ml evaporated milk', '300g caster sugar', '175g butter', '4 egg yolks', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '225g desiccated coconut', '165g chopped pecans']
